"Mrs. Robinson" is a song by American music duo Simon & Garfunkel from their 
fourth studio album, Bookends (1968). Produced by the duo and Roy Halee, it is 
famous for its inclusion in the 1967 film The Graduate. The song was written by 
Paul Simon, who pitched it to director Mike Nichols .... "This Guy's in Love with
